amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-742 to expedite the removal or demotion of a member of the Senior Executive Service.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to expedite the removal or demotion of a member of the Senior Executive Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kuster amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 236 (Roll no. 513).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kuster amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 236 (Roll no. 513).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Kuster.
